name: freeloading
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the action of using money, food, a room in a house, etc. given by other people, but giving nothing to them in exchange: They are looking for ways to put an end to freeloading by public officials. She was unimpressed with his freeloading. See
freeloader
More examplesFewer examplesI don't mind helping out a friend, but this is just freeloading.She claimed that many MPs lived a life of freeloading and luxury.He looked a little shocked by my obvious freeloading.
